text: @piersmorgan Before Covid19, you often referred to your mate Trump about various bits. Now I know we don’t live in the States however this is a worldwide problem so my question is why haven’t you roasted him like you have with Boris, most of the population are actually praising his handling

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
